titleStmt.title: The declaration of the Right Honourable Henry Earle of Cumberland together with divers gentlemen of the county of York,who desire it may be put in print and published in all the parish-churches of this county : 26 August, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Cumberland, Henry Clifford, Earl of, 1591-1643.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
